application.doc: Description for Data Miner 2 Web API

resource.doc: Gets the Lookup values for a specific field in a Feed.

param.name: feedKey
param.doc: The Feed key.

param.name: fieldName
param.doc: Name of the Field.

param.name: isActiveMetadata
param.doc: if set to true [is active metadata].

response.doc: Successfull searches will return the unique values stored in the Field for that Feed.
Lookup Feed or Field name is invalid.
The specified feed could not be found.
Unsupported encoding in Accept header.
An unexpected error has occurred, please try the request again later.

resource.doc: Searches the directory of feeds for any matching the provided search terms and returns some metadata describing the feeds. This metadata includes links to search the feed and retreive additional metadata describing the feed and its' data.

param.name: search
param.doc: The search text to filter results by. This will be used for partial, case-insensitive matches against either the feed's name or description.

param.name: rowCount
param.doc: Format - int32. Specifies the maximum number of results to include in the search result. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: startRow
param.doc: Format - int32. Specifies the one-based number of the first record in the search results to be returned. This is one-based, so 1 is the smallest value allowed and will return the very first record. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: isFrequentlyAccessed
param.doc: Specifies the feed is frequently used.

param.name: isActive
param.doc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is active.

response.doc: Successfull searches will return metadata for the matching feeds, the search criteria used and paging information.
Unsupported encoding in Accept header.
An unexpected error has occurred, please try the request again later.

resource.doc: Searches the Actual/Schedule Summary Report feed. Hourly actual, scheduled, and inadvertent flows by tie line for each hour

param.name: download
param.doc: Determines how results should be returned. When true, only the results will be returned, no links or search criteria will be echoed. Additionally, the total count will be returned in the HTTP Header X-TotalRows, a Content-Disposition header will be added triggering browsers to show a Save prompt, and the rowCount argument becomes optional. Note that there are still limits on the maximum rows that may be returned and, if that threshold is crossed, a 400 response will be returned.

param.name: rowCount
param.doc: Format - int64. Specifies the maximum number of results to include in the search result. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: sort
param.doc: Specifies the name of the field to sort on. Allowed values for this feed are:datetime_beginning_utc, datetime_beginning_ept, datetime_ending_utc, datetime_ending_ept, tie_line

param.name: order
param.doc: Specifies the direction to sort the field on. Allowed values are "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending order. The default value is "asc".

param.name: startRow
param.doc: Format - int64. Specifies the one-based number of the first record in the search results to be returned. This is one-based, so 1 is the smallest value allowed and will return the very first record. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: isActiveMetadata
param.doc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [active metadata only].

param.name: fields
param.doc: Specifies the list of field names to retrieve in the form of a CSV list. Allowed values for this feed are:datetime_beginning_utc, datetime_beginning_ept, datetime_ending_utc, datetime_ending_ept, tie_line, actual_flow, sched_flow, inadv_flow

param.name: datetime_beginning_utc
param.doc: Restricts results to those that have a 'Datetime Beginning UTC' which falls inside the specified date range. Datetime Beginning UTC. Allowed values are: Today, LastWeek, LastMonth, Yesterday, CurrentMonth, CurrentWeek, CurrentYear, LastYear, NextYear, NextMonth, NextWeek, Tomorrow, CurrentHour, MonthsAgo4, MonthsAgo6, LastHour, [date-value] to [date-value].

param.name: datetime_beginning_ept
param.doc: Restricts results to those that have a 'Datetime Beginning EPT' which falls inside the specified date range. Datetime Beginning EPT. Allowed values are: Today, LastWeek, LastMonth, Yesterday, CurrentMonth, CurrentWeek, CurrentYear, LastYear, NextYear, NextMonth, NextWeek, Tomorrow, CurrentHour, MonthsAgo4, MonthsAgo6, LastHour, [date-value] to [date-value].

param.name: datetime_ending_utc
param.doc: Restricts results to those that have a 'Datetime Ending UTC' which falls inside the specified date range. Datetime Ending UTC. Allowed values are: Today, LastWeek, LastMonth, Yesterday, CurrentMonth, CurrentWeek, CurrentYear, LastYear, NextYear, NextMonth, NextWeek, Tomorrow, CurrentHour, MonthsAgo4, MonthsAgo6, LastHour, [date-value] to [date-value].

param.name: datetime_ending_ept
param.doc: Restricts results to those that have a 'Datetime Ending EPT' which falls inside the specified date range. Datetime Ending EPT. Allowed values are: Today, LastWeek, LastMonth, Yesterday, CurrentMonth, CurrentWeek, CurrentYear, LastYear, NextYear, NextMonth, NextWeek, Tomorrow, CurrentHour, MonthsAgo4, MonthsAgo6, LastHour, [date-value] to [date-value].

param.name: tie_line
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Tie Line' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Tie Line

response.doc: Successful searches will return the matching feed items, the search criteria used, paging information, and links to related resources.
The search specification provided is invalid.
The specified feed could not be found.
Unsupported encoding in Accept header.
An unexpected error has occurred, please try the request again later.

resource.doc: Searches the Ancillary Service LMPs feed. This feed contains hourly ancillary services pricing (LMP) data

param.name: download
param.doc: Determines how results should be returned. When true, only the results will be returned, no links or search criteria will be echoed. Additionally, the total count will be returned in the HTTP Header X-TotalRows, a Content-Disposition header will be added triggering browsers to show a Save prompt, and the rowCount argument becomes optional. param.name: rowCount
param.doc: Format - int64. Specifies the maximum number of results to include in the search result. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: sort
param.doc: Specifies the name of the field to sort on. Allowed values for this feed are:datetime_beginning_ept

param.name: order
param.doc: Specifies the direction to sort the field on. Allowed values are "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending order. The default value is "asc".

param.name: startRow
param.doc: Format - int64. Specifies the one-based number of the first record in the search results to be returned. This is one-based, so 1 is the smallest value allowed and will return the very first record. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: isActiveMetadata
param.doc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [active metadata only].

param.name: fields
param.doc: Specifies the list of field names to retrieve in the form of a CSV list. Allowed values for this feed are:datetime_beginning_utc, datetime_beginning_ept, ancillary_service, unit, value, row_is_current, version_nbr

param.name: datetime_beginning_utc
param.doc: Restricts results to those that have a 'Datetime Beginning UTC' which falls inside the specified date range. Datetime Beginning UTC. Allowed values are: Today, LastWeek, LastMonth, Yesterday, CurrentMonth, CurrentWeek, CurrentYear, LastYear, NextYear, NextMonth, NextWeek, Tomorrow, CurrentHour, MonthsAgo4, MonthsAgo6, LastHour, [date-value] to [date-value].

param.name: datetime_beginning_ept
param.doc: Restricts results to those that have a 'Datetime Beginning EPT' which falls inside the specified date range. Datetime Beginning EPT. Allowed values are: Today, LastWeek, LastMonth, Yesterday, CurrentMonth, CurrentWeek, CurrentYear, LastYear, NextYear, NextMonth, NextWeek, Tomorrow, CurrentHour, MonthsAgo4, MonthsAgo6, LastHour, [date-value] to [date-value].

param.name: ancillary_service
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Ancillary Service' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Type of ancillary service

param.name: unit
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Unit Type' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Price or Ratio

param.name: row_is_current
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Latest Version' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Latest Version

param.name: version_nbr
param.doc: Restricts results to those that match the specified value in the 'Version Number' field. This performs an exact, numerical match. Version Number

response.doc: Successful searches will return the matching feed items, the search criteria used, paging information, and links to related resources.

resource.doc: Searches the Day-Ahead Hourly LMPs feed. This feed contains hourly Day-Ahead Energy Market locational marginal pricing (LMP) data for all bus locations, including aggregates

param.name: download
param.doc: Determines how results should be returned. When true, only the results will be returned, no links or search criteria will be echoed. Additionally, the total count will be returned in the HTTP Header X-TotalRows, a Content-Disposition header will be added triggering browsers to show a Save prompt, and the rowCount argument becomes optional. Note that there are still limits on the maximum rows that may be returned and, if that threshold is crossed, a 400 response will be returned.

param.name: rowCount
param.doc: Format - int64. Specifies the maximum number of results to include in the search result. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: sort
param.doc: Specifies the name of the field to sort on. Allowed values for this feed are:datetime_beginning_ept, pnode_id, zone

param.name: order
param.doc: Specifies the direction to sort the field on. Allowed values are "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending order. The default value is "asc".

param.name: startRow
param.doc: Format - int64. Specifies the one-based number of the first record in the search results to be returned. This is one-based, so 1 is the smallest value allowed and will return the very first record. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: isActiveMetadata
param.doc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [active metadata only].

param.name: fields
param.doc: Specifies the list of field names to retrieve in the form of a CSV list. Allowed values for this feed are:datetime_beginning_utc, datetime_beginning_ept, pnode_id, pnode_name, voltage, equipment, type, zone, system_energy_price_da, total_lmp_da, congestion_price_da, marginal_loss_price_da, row_is_current, version_nbr

param.name: datetime_beginning_utc
param.doc: Restricts results to those that have a 'Datetime Beginning UTC' which falls inside the specified date range. Datetime Beginning UTC. Allowed values are: Today, LastWeek, LastMonth, Yesterday, CurrentMonth, CurrentWeek, CurrentYear, LastYear, NextYear, NextMonth, NextWeek, Tomorrow, CurrentHour, MonthsAgo4, MonthsAgo6, LastHour, [date-value] to [date-value].

param.name: datetime_beginning_ept
param.doc: Restricts results to those that have a 'Datetime Beginning EPT' which falls inside the specified date range. Datetime Beginning EPT. Allowed values are: Today, LastWeek, LastMonth, Yesterday, CurrentMonth, CurrentWeek, CurrentYear, LastYear, NextYear, NextMonth, NextWeek, Tomorrow, CurrentHour, MonthsAgo4, MonthsAgo6, LastHour, [date-value] to [date-value].

param.name: pnode_id
param.doc: Restricts results to those that match the specified value in the 'Pricing Node ID' field. This performs an exact, numerical match. Pricing Node ID

param.name: voltage
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Voltage' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Voltage Level

param.name: equipment
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Equipment' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Equipment Description

param.name: type
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Pricing Node Type' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Pricing Node Type

param.name: zone
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Transmission Zone' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Transmission Zone Location

param.name: row_is_current
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Latest Version' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Latest Version

param.name: version_nbr
param.doc: Restricts results to those that match the specified value in the 'Version Number' field. This performs an exact, numerical match. Version Number

response.doc: Successful searches will return the matching feed items, the search criteria used, paging information, and links to related resources.
The search specification provided is invalid.

Unsupported encoding in Accept header.

resource.doc: Searches the Forecasted Generation Outages feed. This data contains the megawatt totals of forecasted generation outages for the next three months. An expected megawatt total is listed for each day for the next three months, and broken down by sub-regions in PJM. These values are forecasts based on available information. It is provided for informational purposes only and should not be relied upon by any party for actual billing values.

resource.doc: Searches the Generation Outage for Seven Days by Type feed. This data contains the actual and scheduled megawatt generation outages for today and the next six days. In addition to providing total outages, the data show subtotals for each of the following outage types: unplanned (forced), maintenance, and planned. In order to provide a perspective on outages that are actually occurring or are scheduled to occur during the operating days, only outages with a status of active or approved are included.

resource.doc: Searches the Hourly Load: Metered feed. This feed summarizes the MW-hour net energy for load as consumed by the service territories within the PJM RTO. Data is supplied by the respective electric distribution companies within PJM, and represents the best quality level of metered load within their zones. This data contains company submitted values or PJM generated estimated values substituted where company data is unavailable. The Company Verified flag indicates whether the value has been verified by the electric distribution company

resource.doc: Searches the Fixed Weighted Average Aggregate Definitions feed. This feed contains the bus distribution factors used in settlements for aggregates with static definitions effective as of the date indicated in Last Updated date. Includes static definitions for hub, interface, load, generation, EHV and FTR apportionment zone

param.name: download
param.doc: Determines how results should be returned. When true, only the results will be returned, no links or search criteria will be echoed. Additionally, the total count will be returned in the HTTP Header X-TotalRows, a Content-Disposition header will be added triggering browsers to show a Save prompt, and the rowCount argument becomes optional. Note that there are still limits on the maximum rows that may be returned and, if that threshold is crossed, a 400 response will be returned.

param.name: rowCount
param.doc: Format - int64. Specifies the maximum number of results to include in the search result. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: sort
param.doc: Specifies the name of the field to sort on. Allowed values for this feed are:effective_date_ept, terminate_date_ept, agg_pnode_id, agg_pnode_name, bus_pnode_id, bus_pnode_name

param.name: order
param.doc: Specifies the direction to sort the field on. Allowed values are "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending order. The default value is "asc".

param.name: startRow
param.doc: Format - int64. Specifies the one-based number of the first record in the search results to be returned. This is one-based, so 1 is the smallest value allowed and will return the very first record. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: isActiveMetadata
param.doc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [active metadata only].

param.name: fields
param.doc: Specifies the list of field names to retrieve in the form of a CSV list. Allowed values for this feed are:effective_date_ept, terminate_date_ept, agg_pnode_id, agg_pnode_name, bus_pnode_id, bus_pnode_name, bus_pnode_factor

param.name: effective_date_ept
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Effective Date EPT' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Effective Date EPT

param.name: terminate_date_ept
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Terminate Date EPT' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Terminate Date EPT

param.name: agg_pnode_id
param.doc: Restricts results to those that match the specified value in the 'Aggregate Pnode ID' field. This performs an exact, numerical match. Aggregate Pricing Node ID

param.name: agg_pnode_name
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Aggregate Pnode Name' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Aggregate Pricing Node Name

param.name: bus_pnode_id
param.doc: Restricts results to those that match the specified value in the 'BUS Pnode ID' field. This performs an exact, numerical match. BUS Pricing Node ID

param.name: bus_pnode_name
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'BUS Pnode Name' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. BUS Pricing Node Name

Additionally, the total count will be returned in the HTTP Header X-TotalRows, a Content-Disposition header will be added as well triggering browsers to show a Save prompt, and the rowCount argument become optional. resource.doc: Searches the Settlements Verified Hourly LMPs feed. This feed contains the verified hourly Real-Time LMPs used in settlements and final Day-Ahead LMPs

param.name: download
param.doc: Determines how results should be returned. When true, only the results will be returned, no links or search criteria will be echoed. Additionally, the total count will be returned in the HTTP Header X-TotalRows, a Content-Disposition header will be added triggering browsers to show a Save prompt, and the rowCount argument becomes optional. Note that there are still limits on the maximum rows that may be returned and, if that threshold is crossed, a 400 response will be returned.

param.name: rowCount
param.doc: Format - int64. Specifies the maximum number of results to include in the search result. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: sort
param.doc: Specifies the name of the field to sort on. Allowed values for this feed are:datetime_beginning_utc, datetime_beginning_ept, pnode_id, pnode_name, zone

param.name: order
param.doc: Specifies the direction to sort the field on. Allowed values are "asc" for ascending or "desc" for descending order. The default value is "asc".

param.name: startRow
param.doc: Format - int64. Specifies the one-based number of the first record in the search results to be returned. This is one-based, so 1 is the smallest value allowed and will return the very first record. This is required if any other parameters are specified.

param.name: isActiveMetadata
param.doc: Gets or sets a value indicating whether [active metadata only].

param.name: fields
param.doc: Specifies the list of field names to retrieve in the form of a CSV list. Allowed values for this feed are:datetime_beginning_utc, datetime_beginning_ept, pnode_id, pnode_name, voltage, equipment, type, zone, system_energy_price_rt, total_lmp_rt, congestion_price_rt, marginal_loss_price_rt, system_energy_price_da, total_lmp_da, congestion_price_da, marginal_loss_price_da

param.name: datetime_beginning_utc
param.doc: Restricts results to those that have a 'Datetime Beginning UTC' which falls inside the specified date range. Datetime Beginning UTC. Allowed values are: Today, LastWeek, LastMonth, Yesterday, CurrentMonth, CurrentWeek, CurrentYear, LastYear, NextYear, NextMonth, NextWeek, Tomorrow, CurrentHour, MonthsAgo4, MonthsAgo6, LastHour, [date-value] to [date-value].

param.name: datetime_beginning_ept
param.doc: Restricts results to those that have a 'Datetime Beginning EPT' which falls inside the specified date range. Datetime Beginning EPT. Allowed values are: Today, LastWeek, LastMonth, Yesterday, CurrentMonth, CurrentWeek, CurrentYear, LastYear, NextYear, NextMonth, NextWeek, Tomorrow, CurrentHour, MonthsAgo4, MonthsAgo6, LastHour, [date-value] to [date-value].

param.name: pnode_id
param.doc: Restricts results to those that match the specified value in the 'Pricing Node ID' field. This performs an exact, numerical match. Pricing Node ID

param.name: pnode_name
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Pricing Node Name' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Pricing Node Name

param.name: voltage
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Voltage' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Voltage Level

param.name: equipment
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Equipment' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Equipment Description

param.name: type
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Pricing Node Type' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Pricing Node Type

param.name: zone
param.doc: Restricts results to those that contain the specified value in the 'Transmission Zone' field. This performs a partial, case-insensitive match. Transmission Zone Location
